comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: There are a couple of mentions in New York Times articles in early 1912 of a Danish wrestler named Carl Nelson. This one from January 29, 1912, says he is the Danish Lightweight champion. This article of January 15, 1912, refers to him a a protege of Jess Pederson, the Danish wrestling champion (presumably in another weight class.) In any case, the guy definitely looks like a wrestler.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: whyaduck: Thanks for the additional information. We'll add it to the source data and reload the description.
